jwiki.core

Class CAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • jwiki.core.CAction

  • public final class CAction
extends Object
    Static methods for performing concurrent actions on a Wiki.
    Author:
    Fastily

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ArrayList<String> addText(Wiki wiki, boolean append, String add, String reason, ArrayList<String> titles)
      Edits pages to append or prepend some text concurrently.
      static ArrayList<String> delete(Wiki wiki, String reason, ArrayList<String> titles)
      Deletes pages concurrently.
      static ArrayList<String> replace(Wiki wiki, String replace, String replacement, String reason, ArrayList<String> titles)
      Concurrently performs text replacement on pages.
      static ArrayList<String> undelete(Wiki wiki, boolean agressive, String reason, ArrayList<String> titles)
      Undelete pages concurrently.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • delete

        public static ArrayList<String> delete(Wiki wiki,
                                       String reason,
                                       ArrayList<String> titles)
        Deletes pages concurrently. The account performing this task requires administrator rights.
        Parameters:
        wiki - The Wiki object to use.
        reason - The deletion log summary to use.
        titles - The titles to delete.
        Returns:
        Pages which were not successfully deleted.

      • undelete

        public static ArrayList<String> undelete(Wiki wiki,
                                         boolean agressive,
                                         String reason,
                                         ArrayList<String> titles)
        Undelete pages concurrently. The account performing this task requires administrator rights.
        Parameters:
        wiki - The Wiki object to use
        agressive - Set True to attempt restoration 10 times before giving up.
        reason - The log reason to use
        titles - The titles to restore.
        Returns:
        Pages which were not successfully restored.

      • addText

        public static ArrayList<String> addText(Wiki wiki,
                                        boolean append,
                                        String add,
                                        String reason,
                                        ArrayList<String> titles)
        Edits pages to append or prepend some text concurrently.
        Parameters:
        wiki - The Wiki object to use
        append - Set True to append text or False to prepend text. WARNING: Newline characters will not be automatically inserted.
        add - The text to add
        reason - The edit summary to use
        titles - The pages to edit
        Returns:
        Pages which were not successfully edited.

      • replace

        public static ArrayList<String> replace(Wiki wiki,
                                        String replace,
                                        String replacement,
                                        String reason,
                                        ArrayList<String> titles)
        Concurrently performs text replacement on pages.
        Parameters:
        wiki - The Wiki object to use
        replace - A regex matching the text on each page to replace.
        replacement - The text to replace any text matching replace.
        reason - The edit summary to use
        titles - The pages to edit
        Returns:
        Pages which were not successfully edited.
